articles.author: Charles Riley, CNN Business
articles.title: Oil surges above $110 and natural gas soars as markets 'panic' over Russia - CNN
articles.description: Global crude oil prices surged to more than $110 per barrel and the cost of natural gas skyrocketed to a new record in Europe on Wednesday as Russia's escalating military campaign in Ukraine stoked fear in markets about a supply shock.
